snippet: Erika Andiola, the young immigrant activist who chronicled the arrests of her mother and brother during an immigration raid here, was hired by Representative Kyrsten Sinema to do outreach.
abstract: Erika Andiola, the young immigrant activist who chronicled the arrests of her mother and brother during an immigration raid here, was hired by Representative Kyrsten Sinema to do outreach.

headline.main: Arizona Congresswoman Hires Immigrant Activist After She Details Raid

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
